Automatic build of 1.3.0 (fc980b81ce4817960492c3336d26b5253baaf8f3) built by Travis CI on 2020-01-26 20:32:51 UTC.
Automatic build of 1.2.1 (fe5085e17bb624a935691afdf6e2134b9ca8ae97) built by Travis CI on 2019-08-06 19:55:24 UTC.
Automatic build of 1.2.0 (0a7a4b830d3ed62727104667d5cc3a8f51374a79) built by Travis CI on 2019-07-23 19:04:59 UTC.

## Enhancement
* Refactor to androidx 

## Bug fixes
* Fix round button text position

Thanks to @MFlisar for contributions :)

Automatic build of 1.1.6 (6628a7136dc25d82377ed58e9f5662c4ae4185ef) built by Travis CI on 2019-07-11 16:14:07 UTC.

## Bug Fixes
* Fix #138 Wrong behaviour of DismissListener with queue
* Fix #128 Getting 0 when trying to access focus position
* Fix clickable focus area problem

## Enhancement
* Move to JCenter
* More samples

Thanks to @svinouze for contributions :)


Automatic build of 1.1.5 (ae23f359bbe8bbda47b621ea2b8fcb329081ade4) built by Travis CI on 2019-01-28 15:49:02 UTC.

name: dev-build-1.1.0
body: Automatic build of 1.1.0 (747ae80f8754065f33858b8c2d5dd1392f075ddb) built by Travis CI on 2018-10-11 10:53:15 UTC.

## Bug Fixes
* Fix #97  Out of memory error
* Fix #106  Make getter/setter of `dismissListener` public

## Enhancement
* Gradle improvements
* Remove unnecessary dependencies
* More samples


Special thanks
to @DigitalSa1nt for the Xamarin ported version [Xamarin.ShowcaseView](https://github.com/DigitalSa1nt/Xamarin.ShowcaseView)
to @chimzycash for logo design
to  @97SBalakrishnan, @ornolisvt, @Pozzoooo and Santiago Laport  for contributions :)

## Enhancement
* Fix #77 Add delay to builder parameters
* Fix #46 Enable click on focused view

Thanks to @andyb129  for contributions :)

## Bug Fixes
* Fix #63 Title position is wrong if fitSystemWindows true
* Fix #74 Enter animation not working

## Enhancement
* Fix #73 Add animation listener for enter/exit animations


Thanks to @efung  for contributions :)

## Enhancement
* Fix #69 - Add builder params to set circle animation radius
* Make focus circle smooth
* Update AndroidManifest.xml

Thanks to @polyak01 and @cuishuai for contributions :)

## Bug Fixes
Fix #57 - Set animCounter to 0 if animation is disabled

## Bug Fixes
* Read view position/size values in onGlobalLayout()
* Out of memory issue on createBitmap #55

## Enhancement
* Listener on complete of ShowCase Queue #49
* Adding APK file for the latest release #2

Thanks to @ncondron42 and @harshvardhan-takawale for contributions :)

## Enhancement
* Fix #41  -  Add cancel method to FancyShowCaseQueue, Update gradle

## Bug Fix
* Fix #45  - Views that are not on focus on are still clickable

## Enhancement
* Fix #3 - Focus a specific position
* Fix #27 - `FancyShowCaseView` extended from `FrameLayout`
* Fix #34 - `disableFocusAnimation` builder param added to disable focus shape animation

Thanks to @daboome , @wengelef for contributions :)

## Enhancement
* Fix #12 - `isVisible()` and `hideCurrent()` static methods added
* Add support for Spanned titles
* Add border support to focus shapes

## Bug Fix
* Remove `android:allowBackup="true"` from library manifest

Thanks to @jikolp95 @MFlisar @daboome @cypressious for contributions :)

## Enhancement
* Fix #17 - Queuing multiple instances
* Fix #18 - Resetting `showOnce()` flag
* Add `DismissListener` 
* Add `titleSize()` builder method

Thanks to @MFlisar for contribution :)

## Enhancement
* Fix #4 - Supporting rounded rectangle focus
* Fix #7 - Accessing mContainer view via mFancyShowCaseView.getView()
## Bug
* Fix #15 - Focusing wrong position on Android 4.x devices

Thanks to @eanurag for contribution :)

- Fix #1 fitSystemWindows parameter added to Builder
- Fix #6  Animated focus area implemented
- Fix #13 Media files removed from project root folder

Thanks to @yerenutku for contribution :)
